column4: Hello all. I'd like to know what the "ideal" temperature for my CPU is. Thanks.
I just installed lm-sensors and it reads 126 F.
so I guess I have to be contented with lm-sensors.
does the output of lm-sensors mention "coretemp" ?
yes, might as well run the tests
you type   sensors  in the temrinal to get the temperature info
is the driver loaded?   lsmod | grep core
okay, so the driver is not loaded, do   sudo modprobe coretemp
you should trust the coretemp one, it uses the sensor that ir built into the CPU, not the ACPI thermal zone
